contract to facilitate buying, selling, auction of items securely","methods":{"addItemForAuction(string,string,string)":{"params":{"auctionType":"describes the type of auction","itemDescription":"describes the item the seller wants to sell","itemName":"is the name of the item"}},"addItemForSale(string,string,uint256)":{"params":{"itemDescription":"describes the item the seller wants to sell","itemName":"is the name of the item","itemPrice":"is the price of the item with which the seller wants to sell it"}},"bidAtAuction(uint256,bytes32)":{"params":{"hashedBid":"is the hashed value of the bid to keep the bid sealed","itemID":"is the id of the item"}},"buyItem(uint256,string)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the unique ID of the item","publicKey":"is the unique publick key of the buyer"}},"deliverItem(uint256,string,string)":{"params":{"encryptedItem":"is the encrypted Secret key sent by the seller using buyers Public Key","itemID":"is the unique ID of the item","publicKey":"is the public key of the seller"}},"getBuyerPublicKey(uint256)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the unique ID of the item"},"return":"Public Key of the buyer who bought item with ID = itemID"},"getItem(uint256)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the unique ID of the item"},"return":"encryptedString provided by the seller which can be decrypted by the buyer using their Private Key"},"getSellerPublicKey(uint256)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the unique ID of the item"},"return":"Public Key of the buyer who bought item with ID = itemID"},"payAndVerifyBid(uint256,string,string)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the id of the item","publicKey":"is the public key of the bidder"}},"stopAuction(uint256)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the id of the item"}},"stopBidding(uint256)":{"params":{"itemID":"is the id of the item"}},"viewItemsForAuction()":{"return":"a string containing list of all available Items for bidding"},"viewItemsForSale()":{"return":"a string containing list of all available Items for bidding"}},"title":"A Modern Way"},"userdoc":{"methods":{"addItemForAuction(string,string,string)":{"notice":"This function is used by a seller to add a new item for the auction."},"addItemForSale(string,string,uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used by a seller to add a new item for sale."},"bidAtAuction(uint256,bytes32)":{"notice":"This function is called by the bidders to bid on the item."},"buyItem(uint256,string)":{"notice":"This function is used by a buyer to buy an item."},"deliverItem(uint256,string,string)":{"notice":"This function is used by a seller to transfer encrypted string to the buyer."},"getBuyerPublicKey(uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used to get the public Key of the buyer."},"getItem(uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used by the buyer to get the encrypted Secret string."},"getSellerPublicKey(uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used to get the public Key of the seller."},"payAndVerifyBid(uint256,string,string)":{"notice":"This function is used by the bidders to pay and verify their bidding."},"stopAuction(uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used by a seller to stop the auction and declare the winner."},"stopBidding(uint256)":{"notice":"This function is used by a seller to stop the bidding."},"viewItemsForAuction()":{"notice":"This function is used by a buyer to view the listing."},"viewItemsForSale()":{"notice":"This function is used by a buyer to view the items up for sale."}}}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"project:/contracts/AModernWay.sol":"AModernWay"},"evmVersion":"istanbul","libraries":{},"optimizer":{"enabled":false,"runs":200},"remappings":[]},"sources":{"project:/contracts/AModernWay.sol":{"keccak256":"0xdeb73c1998d53e98dbdd7cfe82e7d9e5d8b766496f8615d4000a1a0ede83533c","urls":["bzz-raw://44abbc4baca4b1a33e72a18712561e5a159874f8ead10223453a14e470f3e8d5","dweb:/ipfs/QmNf3Es8t9QhqP1UAXGSjF2vvaWLvU64Atqi9wXEVnu27n"]}},"version":1}

nodes.documentation:
@title A Modern Way
@dev Smart contract to facilitate buying, selling, auction of items securely
nodes.name: AModernWay

nodes.documentation:

@param itemID is the unique ID of the item

devdoc.details: Smart contract to facilitate buying, selling, auction of items securely

params.itemDescription: describes the item the seller wants to sell
params.itemName: is the name of the item

params.itemDescription: describes the item the seller wants to sell
params.itemName: is the name of the item
params.itemPrice: is the price of the item with which the seller wants to sell it

params.hashedBid: is the hashed value of the bid to keep the bid sealed
params.itemID: is the id of the item
is the unique ID of the item
params.publicKey: is the unique publick key of the buyer

params.encryptedItem: is the encrypted Secret key sent by the seller using buyers Public Key
params.itemID: is the unique ID of the item
params.publicKey: is the public key of the seller

params.itemID: is the unique ID of the item

getBuyerPublicKey(uint256).return: Public Key of the buyer who bought item with ID = itemID

params.itemID: is the unique ID of the item

getItem(uint256).return: encryptedString provided by the seller which can be decrypted by the buyer using their Private Key

params.itemID: is the unique ID of the item

getSellerPublicKey(uint256).return: Public Key of the buyer who bought item with ID = itemID

params.itemID: is the id of the item
params.publicKey: is the public key of the bidder

params.itemID: is the id of the item
is the id of the item

viewItemsForAuction().return: a string containing list of all available Items for bidding

viewItemsForSale().return: a string containing list of all available Items for bidding

devdoc.title: A Modern Way

addItemForAuction(string,string,string).notice: This function is used by a seller to add a new item for the auction.

addItemForSale(string,string,uint256).notice: This function is used by a seller to add a new item for sale.

bidAtAuction(uint256,bytes32).notice: This function is called by the bidders to bid on the item.

buyItem(uint256,string).notice: This function is used by a buyer to buy an item.

deliverItem(uint256,string,string).notice: This function is used by a seller to transfer encrypted string to the buyer.

getBuyerPublicKey(uint256).notice: This function is used to get the public Key of the buyer.

getItem(uint256).notice: This function is used by the buyer to get the encrypted Secret string.

getSellerPublicKey(uint256).notice: This function is used to get the public Key of the seller.

payAndVerifyBid(uint256,string,string).notice: This function is used by the bidders to pay and verify their bidding.

stopAuction(uint256).notice: This function is used by a seller to stop the auction and declare the winner.

stopBidding(uint256).notice: This function is used by a seller to stop the bidding.

viewItemsForAuction().notice: This function is used by a buyer to view the listing.

viewItemsForSale().notice: This function is used by a buyer to view the items up for sale.
